participant_1.background:
I read a lot about paganism and spirituality and try to live my life in accordance with those beliefs.
i am the leader of the french fry research department at del taco.
I'm enjoying my time after college, jogging is a great way to stay in shape.
I read ebooks on my commute and in my car, so I can enjoy my favorite books while I'm on the go.
i am a dog walker.

participant_2.background:
I once chased a Komodo dragon for 3 hours on a remote island.
I would love to have lunch with my sponsor, who has helped me so much on my journey of recovery.
I'm happy with my weight and would love to have lunch with Quentin Tarantino.
i have 4 children.
I moved to Los Angeles from Tokyo and my brothers helped me a lot, so I am making lunch for them to show my appreciation.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm a dog walker and I just got back from a walk with my favorite pup.
I love dogs! I have four of my own. I'm a stay-at-home mom and my husband is a firefighter.
That sounds like a fun and busy life! I'm glad you're enjoying it.
It is! I'm also really involved in my community. I'm a member of the local Pagan community and I volunteer at the animal shelter.
That's great! I'm also a member of the Pagan community and I love volunteering.
It's so important to give back to the community. I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too! What are your favorite books?
I love to read! I'm currently reading a book about Paganism and spirituality. What about you?
I'm reading a book about Komodo dragons. I'm really interested in reptiles.
That sounds really interesting! I've never seen a Komodo dragon in person.
They're really amazing creatures. I once chased one for 3 hours on a remote island.
That's crazy! I would have been scared out of my mind.
It was a little scary, but it was also really exciting.
I'm glad you made it out alive!
Me too! It was a once-in-a-lifetime experience.
